snippet: A simple kit that works like a pregnancy test could prove helpful in more rapidly diagnosing an illness controllable with antibiotics if caught early.
abstract: Simple kit that works like pregnancy test could prove helpful in rapidly diagnosing cases of bubonic plague; illness, which remains particular threat in Africa, is controllable with antibiotics if caught early.
lead_paragraph: A simple kit that works like a pregnancy test could prove helpful in more rapidly diagnosing an illness controllable with antibiotics if caught early.
